QuestData.Title: Off to the Bank
QuestData.Description: Hi, babe. Are you ready for the party?$B$BNo?! You know I love you, right? I think you need to swing into town and buy a new outfit for the party.$B$BDon't look at me like that... you want to look your best? Don't you want to look good for me? I am your girlfriend after all!$B$BMake sure you swing by the bank first and pull out plenty of macaroons. Don't buy any of that cheap stuff!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the FBoK Bank Teller at the First Bank of Kezan on Kezan.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, it's you, sir! Sorry, I didn't recognize you at first with all of these commoners milling about.$B$BYou people cool your heels! $n is here!$B$BHere are your macaroons, $g sir : ma'am;. Come back anytime if you need more.
